snippet: Ben Affleck gave former ESPN personality Bill Simmons' new HBO talk show a lively start with a five-minute, expletive-filled rant on "Deflategate."...
lead_paragraph: Ben Affleck gave former ESPN personality Bill Simmons' new HBO talk show a lively start with a five-minute, expletive-filled rant on "Deflategate."

headline.main: Ben Affleck Launches Epic 'Deflategate' Rant on New HBO Show
headline.print_headline: Ben Affleck Launches Epic 'Deflategate' Rant on New HBO Show
